page.title.home: TxtWizard | Free Online Tools - Encryption, Hashing, Compression, Ethereum Key Generation
page.description.home: TxtWizard offers free online tools for text encryption, decryption, hashing, compression, Ethereum key generation, and more.
txtwizard-intro: TxtWizard is your go-to platform for free, powerful, and secure online tools. Everything runs entirely within your browser. Explore our features below:
encryption-intro: Easily encrypt sensitive data using AES-GCM or AES-CBC.
decryption-intro: Decrypt AES-encrypted data back to its original form. Supports AES-GCM and AES-CBC.
hashing-intro: Create cryptographic hashes like MD5, SHA1, SHA256, and more. Generate secure hashes for data integrity verification.
compression-intro: Compress text using Gzip, Bzip2, and Deflate. Measure compression ratio and easily obtain compressed results.
keygen-intro: Generate Bitcoin and Ethereum public and private key pairs with a secure local process, right in your browser.
encoding-intro: Convert plain text between Base64, Hex, URL, and HTML encoding formats.
qr-code-intro: A QR code (Quick Response code) is a type of matrix barcode that can encode information such as text, URLs, or other data. It's widely used for contactless payment systems, website links, and more.
currency-intro: Currency to currency conversions using real-time, up-to-date exchange rate information.
